Amazing story, puzzles and overall just a great game. would highly recommend to anybody who likes other valve games.

Ez a játék még mai szemmel nézve is zseniális.  A Valve mesterműve a Portal. Nagyon tetszenek a puzzlek a játékban. Plusz pont azért mert jóval hosszabb mint az első rész. Köszönöm ezt a franchiset.

Evokes the sense of just being fun that I last remember getting from Mario Odyssey in 2017. Now I can be extremely late to the party in complaining about the lack of a third game.

love it

Ez egy borzasztóan jó játék . Én nem tudom hogy aza jatek hogy tud lekotni tobb órán keresztul is de csak ajánlani tudom !!!!!
傳2可真是太好玩了！！什麽時候玩都不會晚！！BGM也超好聽！！

Игра для тех, кто любит интересные головоломки. Даже после прохождения основного сюжета, есть возможность поиграть в кооп сюжет с другом или случайным человеком по сети, а так же поиграть в комнаты сообщества или даже сделать свою при помощи встроенного конструктора.
Не теряет актуальность спустя много лет.

Really nice lore and all the characters feel like how they are supposed to be. Like wheatly is a dumb AI who tries his best to do something but always kind of fails it. And gladyos as usual was irritating not likeable. Caroline and cave johnson also had nice character development. And of course the main part which pulled me to this game the puzzles, They were not the hardest but were fun to solve.Definitely recommend to anyone/everyone who wants a good game to play among the trash games that come out.
Super jeu, amusant, original. Je le recommande :)

Napisz recenzję dla Portal 2
Opisz, co podobało ci się (lub nie) w tej grze i czy polecasz ją innym użytkownikom.
Pamiętaj o zachowaniu uprzejmości i stosowaniu się do zasad i wytycznych.
La co-op et la solo sont tout les deux incroyables !

não sei como esse jogo não foi GOTY quando lançou
sei que competir com Skyrim é meio complicado, mas sem dúvidas esse jogo é um dos maiores da geração retrasada
fez parte da minha infância com toda justiça, jogo se mantém sólido do início ao fim
